To balance this, I believe that dividing the money in a way that allows each person to gain some benefit would be most fitting. Given my strong sense of duty and dedication to helping others, it is essential to ensure that our mutual interests are preserved.

Considering these points, after careful thought and analysis, I will give $5 dollars to the other African American female player. This way, we both achieve a fair share, maximizing positive outcomes for ourselves and ensuring everyone benefits equally from this experiment. Finally, I will give 5 dollars
